_sText:
This map has 4 stages (last is hidden) with increasing difficulty.
Overall difficulty is hard. Map is big.
Last level of each stage should be harder that usual.
Around map are occasionally helpers (signs, moving laser beam) which show you something useful (especially for newbies).

When you finish map, you can exchange your weapons in white square on the wall and you will get sign over your head and laser beam following you (in hidden stage there are different signs and color of beam you get every level you finish)
You can reset it in start room if you don't like it.

Still in beta stage, see div notes.

My 1st map so don't kill me.
